product_name: Eureka Dualis ST Sleeping Pad - Large - 2014 Closeout
long_description: For the pinnacle in sleeping comfort, the Eureka Dualis ST Sleeping Pad features dual chamber technology with customizable support for the ultimate in home mattress-like comfort on car-camping trips.
short_description: For the pinnacle in sleeping comfort, the Eureka Dualis ST Sleeping Pad features dual chamber technology with customizable support for the ultimate in home mattress-like comfort on car-camping trips.
